lyrics.japanese: ねぇ どっかに置いてきたような事が
lyrics.romaji: nee dokka ni oite kita you na koto ga
lyrics.english: Hey, there are things that feel like I left them somewhere

lyrics.japanese: 一つ二つ浮いているけど
lyrics.romaji: hitotsu futatsu uiteiru kedo
lyrics.english: One or two things floating around, but

lyrics.japanese: ねぇ ちゃんと拾っておこう
lyrics.romaji: nee chanto hirotte okou
lyrics.english: Hey, let's properly pick them up

lyrics.japanese: はじけて忘れてしまう前に
lyrics.romaji: hajikete wasurete shimau mae ni
lyrics.english: Before they burst and are forgotten

lyrics.japanese: 回り出した あの子と僕の未来が止まり
lyrics.romaji: mawari dashita ano ko to boku no mirai ga tomari
lyrics.english: The future of that girl and me that started spinning has stopped

lyrics.japanese: どっかで またやり直せたら
lyrics.romaji: dokka de mata yari naoseta ra
lyrics.english: If we could start over somewhere again

lyrics.japanese: 回り出した あの子と僕が被害者面で
lyrics.romaji: mawari dashita ano ko to boku ga higaisha zura de
lyrics.english: That girl and I who started spinning, with victim faces

lyrics.japanese: どっかを また練り歩けたらな
lyrics.romaji: dokka wo mata neri aruketara na
lyrics.english: If we could wander around somewhere again

lyrics.japanese: とぅるるる とぅるるる とぅるる
lyrics.romaji: tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru
lyrics.english: Tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru

lyrics.japanese: とぅるるる とぅるるる とぅるる
lyrics.romaji: tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru
lyrics.english: Tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru

lyrics.japanese: とぅるるる とぅるるる とぅるる
lyrics.romaji: tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru
lyrics.english: Tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru

lyrics.japanese: とぅるるる とぅるるる とぅるる
lyrics.romaji: tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru
lyrics.english: Tu ru ru ru tu ru ru ru tu ru ru

lyrics.japanese: あのね 私あなたに会ったの
lyrics.romaji: ano ne watashi anata ni atta no
lyrics.english: You know, I met you

lyrics.japanese: 夢の中に置いてきたけどね
lyrics.romaji: yume no naka ni oite kita kedo ne
lyrics.english: I left it in a dream though

lyrics.japanese: ねぇ どうして私が好きなの
lyrics.romaji: nee doushite watashi ga suki na no
lyrics.english: Hey, why do you like me?

lyrics.japanese: 一度しか会ったことがないのにね
lyrics.romaji: ichido shika atta koto ga nai no ni ne
lyrics.english: Even though we've only met once

lyrics.japanese: 思いを蹴って 二人でしてんだ
lyrics.romaji: omoi wo kette futari de shiten da
lyrics.english: Kicking away our feelings, the two of us are doing it

lyrics.japanese: 壊れない愛を歌う
lyrics.romaji: wasurenai ai wo utau
lyrics.english: Singing of unbreakable love

lyrics.japanese: 言葉を二人に課して 誓いをたてんだ
lyrics.romaji: kotoba wo futari ni kashite chikai wo taten da
lyrics.english: Imposing words on the two of us, making a vow

lyrics.japanese: 忘れない愛を歌うようにね
lyrics.romaji: wasurenai ai wo utau you ni ne
lyrics.english: To sing of unforgettable love

lyrics.japanese: 回り出した あの子と僕の未来が止まり
lyrics.romaji: mawari dashita ano ko to boku no mirai ga tomari
lyrics.english: The future of that girl and me that started spinning has stopped

lyrics.japanese: どっかで またやり直せたら
lyrics.romaji: dokka de mata yari naoseta ra
lyrics.english: If we could start over somewhere again

lyrics.romaji: mawari dashita ano ko to boku ga higaisha zura de
lyrics.english: That girl and I who started spinning, with victim faces

lyrics.romaji: dokka wo mata neri aruketara na
lyrics.english: If we could wander around somewhere again

lyrics.romaji: dokka wo mata neri aruketara na
lyrics.english: If we could wander around somewhere again

lyrics.japanese: 時代に乗って僕たちは
lyrics.romaji: jidai ni notte bokutachi wa
lyrics.english: Riding the times, we

lyrics.japanese: 変わらず愛に生きるだろう
lyrics.romaji: kawarazu ai ni ikiru darou
lyrics.english: Will live unchangingly for love

lyrics.japanese: 僕らが散って残るのは
lyrics.romaji: bokura ga chitte nokoru no wa
lyrics.english: When we scatter, what remains is

lyrics.japanese: 変わらぬ愛の歌なんだろうな
lyrics.romaji: kawaranu ai no uta nan darou na
lyrics.english: Probably an unchanging song of love
